1.0.name: wordpress/adscaptcha
1.0.description:
AdsCaptcha allows you to put CAPTCHA boxes for spam prevention, and also gain profit from it. With the easy installation of AdsCaptcha, the CAPTCHA in your site will actually be memorable ads. Smart, quick and user friendly.

Sign up now in order to get your activation codes.

Features:
  • Fully configured from the admin panel
  • Setting to hide the CAPTCHA from logged in users and/or admins
  • Setting to show the CAPTCHA on the registration form and/or comment form
Requirements/Restrictions:
  • Works with Wordpress 2.6+
  • PHP 4.3+
  • Your theme must have a <?php do_action('comment_form', $post->ID); ?> tag inside your comments.php form. Most themes do. If not, in your comments.php file, put before .
